
```{r abbreviations,  echo=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(tidyr)
library(kableExtra)
abbreviations <- read_xlsx("figure/Abbreviations/Abbreviations.xlsx")
abbreviations <- abbreviations[order(abbreviations$Abbreviation),]

abbreviations %>% kable(caption = "Full list of abbreviations", booktabs = TRUE) %>% 
  kable_classic_2(full_width = F) %>%
 kable_styling(full_width = TRUE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "3cm") 
```
